description: MarsCode provides an IDE with a built-in AI Assistant and extensions that support over 100 languages and mainstream IDEs.
title: MarsCode - Code and Innovate Faster with Al
introduction: MarsCode is a platform that offers a suite of tools for developers to enhance their coding experience.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free trial available for new users.

faqs.question: What is the target user of MarsCode?
faqs.answer: MarsCode is designed for developers and coding enthusiasts who want to streamline their coding process.
